label: AB2C_hP4_187_a_g_d-002
title: InTaS$_{2}$ Structure
comments:
Many, if not all, of the compounds listed here have sub-stoichiometric occupation on the (1a) site.  The site is reported as fully occupied in InTaS$_{2}$. 
 The value $z_{3}$ = 0.32 for the sulfur (2c) site is inferred from the value given for Pb$_{x}$TaS$_{2}$ by (Eppinga, 1980). 
 \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2C_hP4_187_a_g_d-001}{LiAgC$_{2}$} and \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2C_hP4_187_a_g_d-002}{InTaS$_{2}$} have the same AFLOW label, AB2C\_hP4\_187\_a\_g\_d. They are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
